ygData.subject: Re: Solusek bard quest items...
ygData.msgSnippet: Well hmm...  Can we hear from some people that DID find the quest items?  Is there anything special you did?  And how long did it take? Thanks... ... -- Steven
ygData.messageBody:
Well hmm... Can we hear from some people that DID find the quest items? Is there anything
special you did? And how long did it take?

Thanks...


"CYR, Thierry" wrote:

> From: "CYR, Thierry" <tcyr@...>
>
> if it makes you feel better my buddy camped that room for about 14 hours
> straight (what a goof!) i went in there for about 2 hours the other night
> with some buddies, we needed the ring from the king and i needed the
> boots.... Well to make a long story short, a dozen champs, half a dozen
> mages, a few shaman and not a damn king later, we got absolutely nothing,
> though i did get a heart for the ranger sleeves.
>
> Minkin
> Sol ro
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Steven S. Klug [SMTP:sklug@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, November 04, 1999 12:59 PM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: [eqbards] Solusek bard quest items...
> >
> > From: "Steven S. Klug" <sklug@...>
> >
> > Hello everyone. Last night I had a disappointing fiasco in Solusek. I
> > got together a good group and went in to get my two bard quest items.
> > We headed for the king room, and managed to break the spawn (thank you
> > Lament). We camped the room for about 4 hours. Almost everyone in the
> > group had some quest item they wanted, and I was the only bard. Well,
> > to make a long story short, after killing at least 25 solusek champions,
> > 5 sol mages, 6 sol shamans, 25ish inferno goblins. Not a single one of
> > us got a quest item. Are these supposed to be that rare? Are we just
> > in the wrong place to find these items or what? We got a couple
> > mediocre items off the king, but I didn't get any of them (lost the
> > roll). To add insult to injury, just as I was saying I needed to go (I
> > had already stayed up 2 hours late), we had a bad pull, and half of us
> > died. And I awoke to......Greater Feydark. Heh... Oops. Thank god for
> > revive.
> >
> > Any insight? Did they nerf it with the latest patch or something? Or
> > has it always been this rare for them to drop the quest items?
> >
> > Frustrated,
> >
> > Laluni Songhammer, Level 29 bard of E'Ci.
> >
> > --
> > Steven S. Klug
> > sklug@...
> >
> > > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
> > with the subject lol.
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with the subject lol.

--
Steven S. Klug
sklug@...
